mapper.select: SELECT MAX(id) AS MAX_ID FROM xxl_job_info

SELECT *, JSON_VALUE(executor_param, '$.planKey') as 'plan_key' from ( SELECT a.id , job_group , job_desc , add_time , a.update_time , author , alarm_email , schedule_type , schedule_conf , misfire_strategy , executor_route_strategy , executor_handler , executor_param , executor_block_strategy , executor_timeout , executor_fail_retry_count , glue_type , glue_source , glue_remark , glue_updatetime , child_jobid , trigger_status , trigger_last_time , trigger_next_time FROM xxl_job_info a join xxl_job_group b on a.job_group = b.id where b.app_name = 'notification-center') t where JSON_VALUE(executor_param, '$.planKey') = #{planKey} or #{planKey} is null or #{planKey} = ''
